mapper.select: select count(*) as totCnt from statistic.requestinfo ri where left(ri.createDate, 2) = #{year};
select count(*) as totCnt from statistic.requestinfo ri where left(ri.createDate, 4) = #{yearMonth};
select mid(ri.createDate, 3, 2) as month, count(*) as loginNum from statistic.requestinfo ri where left(ri.createDate, 2) = #{year} group by mid(ri.createDate, 3, 2);
select distinct mid(ri.createDate, 3, 2) as month from statistic.requestinfo ri where left(ri.createDate, 2) = #{year} order by month asc;

select requestCode as dept, mid(ri.createDate, 3, 2) as month, count(*) as loginNum from statistic.requestinfo ri where left(ri.createDate, 4) = #{yearMonth} group by requestCode, mid(ri.createDate, 3, 2);
